original_text: Those powerful people have turned away from God. They have not respected his commands. Those powerful people have turned away from God. They have not respected his commands. Those powerful people have turned away from God. They have not respected his commands. Those powerful people have turned away from God. They have not respected his commands. Those powerful people have turned away from God.
korean_text: 그들이 그를 떠나고 그의 모든 길을 깨달아 알지 못함이라

sentences.original_text: Those powerful people have turned away from God.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 권세 있는 사람들은 하나님에게서 돌아섰습니다.
